announcements.title: New Academic Year Registration Open
announcements.message: Registration for the new academic year 2025-26 is now open. Please complete your registration before the deadline.

announcements.title: Library Extended Hours
announcements.message: The library will have extended hours during exam period from 7 AM to 11 PM daily.

announcements.title: Campus WiFi Maintenance
announcements.message: Scheduled maintenance of campus WiFi infrastructure on August 30th from 2 AM to 6 AM. Temporary connectivity issues expected.

announcements.title: New Course Offerings
announcements.message: Explore new elective courses available for the upcoming semester. Registration starts September 1st.

announcements.title: System Upgrade Notice
announcements.message: VTOP will be temporarily unavailable on August 29th from 12 AM to 4 AM for system upgrades.
